comment.author: 53212758@N06
comment._content: Im so glad to see them ,My grandfather is a white russian, he is the only son of russian family,born at petrograd russia.Onboard imperial navy ship from siberia then landed to mareveles, bataan, philippines on jan,17 1918 at age of 14 yrs.old.Change his surname as slavetzky.The ship under the command of commodore stark. somebody can help me?
